mesa.neighborhoods: Downtown Mesa, Eastmark, Lehi, Dobson Ranch, Red Mountain, Superstition Springs
mesa.meetingHighlights: Active neighborhood meetings with strong attendance near downtown and the college areas; a mix of open and closed formats.
mesa.transitInfo: Valley Metro buses and light rail (nearby Phoenix) provide connections; Phoenix Sky Harbor International Airport (PHX) accessible.

phoenix.neighborhoods: Downtown, Arcadia, Camelback East, Roosevelt Row, Midtown, Biltmore
phoenix.meetingHighlights: Large and diverse AA presence with meetings across neighborhoods, numerous Spanish-language and specialty meetings, and strong downtown speaker events.
phoenix.transitInfo: Valley Metro light rail and buses cover Phoenix; Phoenix Sky Harbor International Airport (PHX) is the primary airport.

scottsdale.neighborhoods: Old Town Scottsdale, DC Ranch, McDowell Mountain Ranch
scottsdale.meetingHighlights: Popular evening and weekend meetings in Old Town and community centers; many meetings attract attendees from Greater Phoenix.
scottsdale.transitInfo: Bus connections into Phoenix and local circulators; Phoenix Sky Harbor (PHX) and nearby Scottsdale Airport provide access.

tucson.neighborhoods: Downtown, Catalina Foothills, Sam Hughes, Barrio Viejo, West University, South Tucson
tucson.meetingHighlights: Active university-area meetings and bilingual offerings; diverse formats including Big Book and speaker nights.
tucson.transitInfo: Sun Tran buses serve Tucson; Tucson International Airport (TUS) for regional flights.

chandler.neighborhoods: Downtown Chandler, Ocotillo, Sun Lakes, Fulton Ranch
chandler.meetingHighlights: Growing suburban recovery community with evening meetings; family-friendly atmosphere; strong service commitment.
chandler.transitInfo: Valley Metro bus connections; Phoenix Sky Harbor International Airport (PHX) nearby.

glendale.neighborhoods: Downtown Glendale, Arrowhead Ranch, Westgate, Historic Catlin Court
glendale.meetingHighlights: West Valley recovery hub with diverse meetings; strong Latino community presence; meetings near State Farm Stadium.
glendale.transitInfo: Valley Metro bus service; Phoenix Sky Harbor International Airport (PHX) accessible.
